en:
HA HA !
You pressed the buzzer
Now, you'll have to press it
EVERY 10 SECONDS
Every 10 seconds...\nI really got you didn't I ?
Oh well... who am i kidding ? ...\nYou knew very well it was a trap.
Did you bring an umbrella ?
Does this buzzer think its Goku or something ?
Don't worry, not a lot of people can pass this one
This one does not like to stay in place
In that case let's make this game\na little harder
How doesn't like a game of pong ?
The tinier, the cuter\n\n:3
Two buzzers !\n\nYou didn't expected that did you ?
All right let's spice things up a bit
Needle, haystackâ€¦
Amazing...
Hockety pockety wockety wack
I call this one the grasshopper
No cap, no buzz\n\nI am a genius !
I switch off the power on this thing\n\nno power... no buzzer !
Oopsy, I dropped the buzzer !
Are you good at time estimation ?
I broke this buzzer's light
I love the way the cap glows when\nthe buzzer's ready to be pressed
Ah ah, I turned the light off, you cannot see a thing\nvictory is mine
This one is really tricky
BOOOoooo!\nYou are a lousy buzzer presser
Gotcha ! You should've trust the count-down

Oh My Good !!!
How did you manage to loose at this stage ?

YOU JUST HAVE TO PRESS THE BUZZER
EVERY 10 SECONDS !!!
A genius indeed
If you've made this far, write 'banana' in your comment ;)
Is this buzzer too tiny for your big fingers ?
Told you it was tricky
